data.name: XListEntrySource
desc: specifies a source of string list entries
The interface supports foreign components which actively retrieve list entries, as well as components which want to passively being notified of changes in the list.

methods.name: addListEntryListener
desc: adds a listener which will be notified about changes in the list reflected by the component.

methods.name: getAllListEntries
desc: provides access to the entirety of all list entries

methods.name: getListEntry
desc: provides access to a single list entry

methods.name: getListEntryCount
desc: retrieves the number of entries in the list

methods.name: removeListEntryListener
desc: revokes the given listener from the list of components which will be notified about changes in the entry list.
